block.p: TALBERT--Jerome, formerly of Great Neck, NY. Former head of business affairs at the William Morris Agency, NY. Beloved husband of Marilyn, devoted father of Amy Hartwig, loving father-in-law of Charles, dear brother of Laurens and the late Beverly Boxer, most caring grandfather of Evan and Abby. Services at ''Bernheim-ApterKreitzman'' 68 Old Short Hills Rd. Livingston, NJ on Tuesday at 10:30am. For information please call 1-800-938-6372.
